elements.name: weaponsReasons
elements.title: Explain the reason for your concerns:

elements.name: RespondentWeaponsYes
elements.title: Do you think {RespondentName} own any weapons that are not everyday objects, guns or explosives?
elements.description:
Do not answer "YES" for everyday objects like a kitchen knife, baseball bat or a hammer.

Examples of weapons that someone may own include hunting knifes, bows and arrows, swords, nunchucks, brass knuckles or throwing stars.

elements.name: weaponsYesReason
elements.title: Explain the reason for your belief:

elements.name: RespondentNoWeapons
elements.title:
By answering "NO" to the questions above, you believe there is no need for a judge to order {RespondentName} not to have any weapons or firearms. If there is a concern about {RespondentName} having or using weapons or firearms, go back to the questions above and answer "YES."

If you have no concerns about weapons or firearms, please confirm by checking the statement below.

choices.text: I have no concern over weapons or firearms.
